Description: Exceptional rental opportunity in Malden's desirable Edgeworth neighborhood! This clean move-in ready four bedroom, two bathroom home has plenty of space with three floors of living space and an additional den/office area on the second floor. The outdoor space is amazing with a beautiful covered front porch, a fenced-in back yard, a large private deck for entertaining, and plenty of off street parking. Plenty of storage here as well with a full basement with laundry, and lots of closet space. Location can't be beat! Close to shopping, bus stops, Malden Station, Assembly Row, the highway, parks, and more. A must see! No smoking or pets allowed. Tenants to pay all utilities.
